content: Hi Sara - thanks! All texters are required to go through the text training for 2024. Here is the link to sign up for a session! https://events.democrats.org/event/672393/ May have a few more dates added soon too
I’m trying to join the current session but the link won’t load
I’m not sure if the issue is on my end with my internet, or if others can’t access the link either.
Hi! The mobilize link itself is having some lag issues - but there’s no current training going on.
Oh hmmm that’s weird, I had signed up for a session at this time
But yeah now I can’t even access the link to sign up for the training
Got it - hm! Do you have the email confirmation you can send me? There wasn't a text training thorugh us (DNC) tonight - maybe another group?
It won’t let me attach a pic, that’s ok
Okay I was able to use the link and sign up, thx!
Sara - apologies, I just found out there *was* a training last night (Swifties for Kamala).
For the next session you signed up for - please make sure you're signed into your Zoom account *before* joining the meeting link
Yes that's right, it was the Swifties one! That's okay, I'm in the training session that's going on now!
